abilities.name: Exciting Stage
abilities.effect: Once during your turn, you may draw cards until you have 3 cards in your hand. If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, you may draw cards until you have 4 cards in your hand instead. You can’t use more than 1 Exciting Stage Ability each turn.

attacks.name: X-Scissor
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 80 more damage.
